greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of primes = 1 mod 4 dividing n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = p if p = 1 (mod 4), 0 otherwise.
mathematica: Array[DivisorSum[#, # &, And[PrimeQ@ #, Mod[#, 4] == 1] &] &, 101] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 11 2017 *)
program: (PARI) a(n)=my(f=factor(n)[,1]); sum(i=1,#f,if(f[i]%4==1,f[i])) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 11 2014
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
